rooms.description: North-facing entrance with a foyer that adheres to Vastu principles. The entrance is oriented towards the north, ensuring positive energy flow.
Spacious open-plan living area with minimalist design and natural light access from north-facing windows. Vastu compliant placement for family activity.
Functional modern kitchen designed in a minimalist style with Vastu-compliant orientation ensuring efficient energy flow and ease of movement.
Dining area integrated within the living space to promote social interactions, designed with Vastu principles in mind regarding balance and energy circulation.
Two-car garage that doubles as storage space. Located on the east side to maintain a balanced layout and ease of vehicle access.
Functional minimalist bathroom designed with Vastu guidelines ensuring proper flow and privacy.
Spacious master bedroom oriented to ensure privacy and Vastu compliance with north-east direction for positive energy.
Additional bedroom designed in a minimalist style ensuring proper Vastu alignment.
Secondary bathroom located conveniently for both bedrooms and adhering to Vastu norms.
